title: Beef and veggie meatloaf
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 green pepper, diced', '80g diced onion', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', '450g lean beef mince (5% fat)', '100g wholemeal breadcrumbs', '2 large eggs', '80g grated carrot', '85g grated courgette', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons ketchup, or to taste']
